overview: “Stop! In the name of love where did our love go? My world is empty without you – you are everything and everything is you. You keep me hanging on upside down. Remember me? It's my turn. I'm still waiting. I'm gonna make you love me. I'm coming out. I hear a symphony. Doobedood'ndoobe, doobedood'ndoobe, doobedood'ndoo.
tagline: Surrender! A film about the pressures of modern love.
title: Surrender!
